availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Benjamin F. Troutman (Bullitt County, Kentucky, wheelwright)

body.p: Jefferson County and Bullitt County, Kentucky, wheelwright and wagon maker. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Missouri Troutman. Father of Mary Troutman. Wheelwright in Jefferson County in 1860. Wagon maker in Bullitt County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 330.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Bullitt County, KY, 863, p. 194, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "B. F. Troutman (1819-May 12, 1875)," Memorial #27044369, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/27044369 (accessed September 20, 2019).
